system.description:
A ¾ inch cube of bone, ivory, or stone. Pressing the faces of the cube activates a 10’ cubic force field around the character.

  • Pressing faces: Each face of the cube activates or deactivates the force field, with the effects shown in the table below.

  • Charges: The cube has 36 charges per day. Activating the force field consumes a number of charges per turn (see table).

  • Blocking other effects: Effects other than those listed in the table can be blocked, but cost additional charges:

    • Catapult shot / thrown boulders: 1 charge

    • @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.biw4yLLBqWNiRwLZ]{Wall of fire } / non-magical inferno: 2 charges

    • @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.ZrYh8AabsTCnqRjb]{Fire ball} /@UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.yGIGg1GYsCQApO20]{pass-wall}: 3 charges

    • @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.anWBslOOlZtV47ut]{Lightning bolt}: 4 charges

    • @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.magic-items.Item.4OhvzUBNlVFIolf5]{Horn of Blasting} / @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.Qia3KIVoKxni1VDo]{disintegrate}: 6 charges

Cube of Force: Effects by Side

#ChargesMoveKeeps Out
11120’ (40’)Gases, wind
2290’ (30’)Nonliving matter
3360’ (20’)Living things
4430’ (10’)Magic
556’ (2’)All things
60NormalDeactivates

  • Charges: Charges expended per turn.

  • Move: Maximum movement rate while force field of this type is active.
